item.title: Create a Mini Baking Soda Rocket?
item.description: Creating a mini baking soda rocket can be a fun and educational experiment. Here's a simple guide to making one: Materials you will need: A film canister with a tight-fitting lid Baking soda (sodium bicarbonate) Vinegar Tissue or toilet paper Safety goggles (optional but recommended for eye protection) (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); Instructio
item.dc:creator: Karthik Kumar D K
